alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 17 at 1:58AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 300 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in normally dry washes. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may be impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 158 AM MST, Minor flooding is ongoing on the Detrital Wash where it crosses White Hills Road. Flows have been decreasing since midnight and water should recede over White Hills Road by 3 am MST. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... White Hills Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
